data.name: Cryo
data.mechanic: Your ranged weapon deals cold damage and can detonate primed targets. Successful ranged attacks cause the targer to become {primed-cold} and reduce its movement speed by half until the end of its next turn.

data.name: Disruptor
data.mechanic: Your ranged weapon deals lightning damamge and can detonate primed targets. Successful ranged attacks cause the targer to become {primed-lightning} until the end of its next turn.

data.name: Incendiary
data.mechanic: Your ranged weapon deals fire damage and can detonate primed targets. Successful ranged attacks deal an additional 1d4 fire damage and cause the target to become {primed-fire}.

data.name: Shredder
data.mechanic: Your ranged weapon deals slashing damage and an additional 1d4 slashing damage to unprotected, organic enemies.

data.name: Warp
data.mechanic: Your ranged weapon deals necrotic damage and can detonate primed targets. A successful ranged attack on a target with an active barrier will remove 2 barrier ticks and negate the damage reduction.

data.name: Explosive
data.mechanic: Successful ranged attacks deal and additional 1d4 thunder damage.

data.name: Drill
data.mechanic: Ignore half cover. A target with three quarter cover is considered to have half cover instead.

data.name: Phasic
data.mechanic: Ranged weapon attack damage bypasses shields.
